bnf: dfs.namenode.write.stale.datanode.ratio > 0.5f => dfs.namenode.avoid.write.stale.datanode is valid and non-null
dfs.datanode.sync.behind.writes = true => dfs.datanode.sync.behind.writes.in.background is valid and non-null
dfs.webhdfs.rest-csrf.enabled = true => dfs.webhdfs.rest-csrf.methods-to-ignore in {GET, HEAD, OPTIONS}
dfs.webhdfs.rest-csrf.custom-header != null => dfs.webhdfs.rest-csrf.methods-to-ignore in {GET, POST, PUT, DELETE}
